title: NEW URF FEATURE - for when they bring it back T_T
body:
So i was thinking what would be really cool is if when the finally bring the best game mode/most fun game-mode 'URF' is that if they removed the *'Unique Passives with the same name do not stack'* feature. I also don't know if its the same thing or not, but you could have say 3 hydras in your build and you would be able to activate them separately so like with a tap of each number you could clear a wave of minions (****champions****). 
Anyway please bump so someone from rito and suggest this to the game designers. 

it would be cool if we could comment on op or items that should be banned.
 i'd hope this really does happen. my choice would definitely be {{item:3068}} or holy dam {{item:3089}}

too much raba spam... would be cool if not for that (sigh)
